thread.title: Travel chaos continues as fog halts flights | Channel
thread.title_full: Travel chaos continues as fog halts flights | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Travel chaos continues as fog halts flights | Channel
text:
Travellers in Jersey and Guernsey are facing chaos again this morning, as low cloud is stopping flights getting to the islands.
It comes after no flights landed in Jersey yesterday , affecting 1,500 people and passengers in Guernsey were left facing a similar situation.
The mail and newspaper planes did land in both islands early this morning, but so far all other flights have been severely delayed or cancelled.
Flight to Birmingham, London Gatwick, Guernsey, Manchester and Exeter have been scrapped because aircraft couldn't land.
A gap in the fog around lunchtime has allowed some planes to touch down .
Hundred of passengers are stranded in both islands Advice to passengers is to talk to their airline to see if they should check in as normal.
Stronger winds are expected this afternoon , which could help to shift some of the low cloud that is causing the problem.
But, the overall outlook isn't positive until Thursday.
Sorry, this content isn't available on your device.
You can check flights on Jersey Airport's website or Guernsey Airport's website.
